short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPA calculation and restyling for gradebooks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate your GPA and restyle your gradebook with Better Gradebooks!

 - Change course weightings and exclude courses from GPA calculation
 - View your projected GPA based on your current grades*
 - Set a background and toggle custom graphics

*Better Gradebooks calculates your projected GPA using the grades from the last 
time you viewed your gradebook.
Your grades are only stored in your google account, and they are only accessible by your google account. 

Feedback: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfDfZIoHnz9FMHjdkMjzryiTJvWS1DbMJv169qrVVTirW5SGA/viewform

Supports:
StudentVUE
